tool.name: JBrowse - Data Directory to Standalone
tool.description: upgrades the bare data directory to a full JBrowse instance
tool.command: ## Create output directory mkdir -p $output.files_path && ## Copy in jbrowse cp -R \${JBROWSE_SOURCE_DIR}/* $output.files_path/ && ## Copy in data directory cp -R $input.files_path/data/ $output.files_path/ && cat $output.files_path/index.html > $output
tool.help:
Upgrades an existing bare JBrowse "data" directory into a full-fledged JBrowse instance.
